attributes.additional_details:
I am requesting it be lobbied that the rules by which the CSA are operating be re evaluated and that the voice of both RP's and NRP's be heard.
eg - two children, one each living with each parent - No maintenance payments . Rather than one paying more to the other because he/she got out there, worked harder and earns more.
eg - the RP income is means tested before an award is given.
